heading: Penalties
text:
In addition to the penalties provided for in this chapter, any person who fails to comply with a stop work
   order shall be liable for a civil penalty in the amount of five thousand dollars for the initial violation and ten thousand d ollars for
   every subsequent violation, to be paid to the department prior to the rescission of the stop work order; provided, however, this
   shall not apply to any work performed to remedy an unsafe or hazardous condition as authorized by order of the commissioner.
